answers.answer: If its sudden swelling that doesn't go away after some water and elevating them then you need to go in. That's a sign of preeclampsia, but you could of just over done it too. Just rest and see what happens.
My legs feet and ankles are always swollen. And I get leg cramps. If you keep them elevated, it should go away. If you're concerned just ask your ob about it.

question: I am 28 weeks and  today my ankles have swollen very  bad  I now have pains in my legs and lower back pain
title: 28 weeks
